review:
my mind simply can't stop comparing it with the milestone movie satya.

excellent camera work.
real in reel.
very realistic yet fascinating.
superb superb background score
detailed work on filming special force of police.
exact and very on point casting.
great direction
and above all mind flattering acting by legendary actor nana patekar.

like satya no catchy numbers.
afraid only that thing might have triggered negative for publicity.

overall a master piece.

respect. amazing performance and real fact. i salute mr. patekar for his natural acting.. he is rare kind of actor are who just behave like normal citizen he dosnt act no matter if his films are not 300 crore films like some bad actors like bhaijaan or king khan...people know who is nana patekar.
nanaji is an icon. he is so realistic. i would love to meet him and give him a hug in my life time. hope so god gives me an opportunity to meet him.
doesn't looks like a movie because of its originality. best gangster movie all time. 5 star rating.
best crime thriller ever produced in indian cinema.you can watch it over and over and over still u will be thrilled every time.

what a great movie... 
excellent acting by our. beloved nana patekar sir. .
what an amazing movie. nana leads the stellar cast with complete machismo
what an grt movie... nana patekar sirs acting * dialog delivery superb
one of the best movies. no one can act like  nanaji...
at first the title kills the interest.secondly loosely based plot kills the rest.this movie can be watched to witness nana s flawless acting.
a very good movie. strong acting by nana patekar.4 out of five
